properties.Description: Nelmac attending Water Leak at #28-30 Bronte Street - Traffic Management set up is a shoulder closure.

Sewer and stormwater service upgrade. Vehicle access for residents/businesses, couriers and home help will not be available during the day – due to the work requiring excavation of the road.
As work progresses residents will regain access.
properties.Notes:
Residents will be provided vehicle access every night between 5:00 pm and 8:00 am. 
No roadside parking will be available – please ensure that your vehicle is parked outside the closure zone before 8:00 am. Pedestrian access will be provided safely.

properties.Description: Retaining wall repairs. Vehicle access for residents/businesses, couriers and home help will unfortunately not be available during the day – due to the limitations of the narrow street. Residents will have access every night between 5:30 pm and 7:00 am.
properties.Notes:
Residents within the closure zone will need to ensure that their vehicles are parked outside the closure zone before 7:00 am each day.
Pedestrian access will be provided safely and will always be available to all properties within the closure zone.

properties.Description: Retaining wall repairs. Vehicle access for residents/businesses, couriers and home help will unfortunately not be available for the duration of the works (this is a 24-hour closure) – due to the limitations of the narrow street.
properties.Notes:
Access for Beachville Crescent and Stanley Crescent residents will be available via Russell Street.
Emergency access will be maintained at all times.
Pedestrian access will be provided.
Rubbish and recycling bins will be collected as normal.

properties.Description: Watermain upgrade – this work has been commissioned by Nelson City Council. Vehicle access for residents/businesses, couriers and home help will be available most of the time. Delays are likely. During some stages of the work there will be no access.
properties.Notes:
Or access will be available from only one end of the street – the contractor will notify residents prior to any changes in access. (Emergency access will be maintained).
Parking will be managed by onsite staff. Rubbish collected as normal.

properties.Description: Upgrade of Council stormwater pipes and drains. •	Vehicle access for residents, couriers and home help will be available most of the time - from either side of the closure. Please follow the directions of onsite staff.
properties.Notes: At certain phases of the project, a single lane controlled by traffic lights will be utilised to ensure safe vehicle access past the worksite. During some stages of the work there will be no vehicle access to properties within the work area.
